akn:section.akn:heading: Known claims against dissolved limited liability company.

akn:content.akn:p: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (d) of this section, a dissolved limited liability company may give notice of a known claim under subsection (b) of this section, which shall have the effect as provided in subsection (c) of this section.
A dissolved limited liability company may in a record notify its known claimants of the dissolution. The notice shall:
A claim against a dissolved limited liability company shall be barred if the requirements of subsection (b) of this section are met and:
This section shall not apply to a claim based on an event occurring after the effective date of dissolution or a liability that on that date is contingent.
